DOC.brief_summary: This study compare hemodialysis treatment standard , high-bicarbonate dialysis bath versus lower bicarbonate dialysis bath , compare intradialytic acid-base change overall control metabolic acidosis 2 treatment regimen . These parameter assess patient currently receive high-bicarbonate hemodialysis part usual care . They switch low bicarbonate prescription , parameter reassess . The study also examine change inflammatory marker , glycemic control , ketogenesis , lipolysis .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison High Versus Low Bicarbonate Hemodialysis
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 Receiving chronic thriceweekly conventional hemodialysis least 6 month Use oral alkali within previous month Hospitalization within previous month Inability provide write informed consent Plans kidney transplant next 2 month Planned change phosphate binder therapy within next month Pregnancy , plan pregnancy next 2 month
